# thunder_cgnv6_stateful_firewall_alg_sip (Resource)

`thunder_cgnv6_stateful_firewall_alg_sip`: Configure SIP ALG for NAT stateful firewall (default: enabled)

__PLACEHOLDER__

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "thunder" {
  address  = var.dut9049
  username = var.username
  password = var.password
}
resource "thunder_cgnv6_stateful_firewall_alg_sip" "thunder_cgnv6_stateful_firewall_alg_sip" {
  sampling_enable {
    counters1 = "all"
  }
  sip_value = "disable"
}
```
